params.name: model
params.description: The name of the checkpoint to use for the model, or the instantiated model. If unset, will default to thevalue of the class attribute default_checkpoint.

params.name: pre_processor
params.description: The name of the checkpoint to use for the pre-processor, or the instantiated pre-processor (can be atokenizer, an image processor, a feature extractor or a processor). Will default to the value of model ifunset.

params.name: post_processor
params.description: The name of the checkpoint to use for the post-processor, or the instantiated pre-processor (can be atokenizer, an image processor, a feature extractor or a processor). Will default to the pre_processor ifunset.

params.name: device
params.description: The device on which to execute the model. Will default to any accelerator available (GPU, MPS etcâ€¦), theCPU otherwise.

params.name: device_map
params.description: If passed along, will be used to instantiate the model.

params.name: model_kwargs
params.description: Any keyword argument to send to the model instantiation.

params.name: token
params.description: The token to use as HTTP bearer authorization for remote files. If unset, will use the token generated whenrunning huggingface-cli login (stored in ~/.huggingface).

params.name: hub_kwargs
params.description: Any additional keyword argument to send to the methods that will load the data from the Hub.
